historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following ยง 19-601.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon ยง 309 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act). See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE ยง 19-603.09

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A transfer on death resulting from a registration in beneficiary form is effective by reason of the contract regarding the registration between the owner and the registering entity and this subchapter and is not testamentary.
This subchapter does not limit the rights of creditors of security owners against beneficiaries and other transferees under other laws of the District.

chapter.text: Nonprobate Transfers on Death; Uniform Law. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Uniform Transfers on Death Security Registration. (Refs & Annos)
